title: Didn't receive champion capsule for lvling up to 32
body: As the title says a day ago i lvled up and after the match it showed me that i got a champion capsule but it isn't in my loot.

replies.body: Heya, it looks like you got 32 about 2 days ago.  You received a capsule at this time containing a shard for Bard.  Hope that helps clear things up!
